DataElement.preferredName: External Beam Radiation Therapy Facility Patient Questionnaire Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no indicator to ask if a set of questions was completed to collect data about an individual for receiving care at an institution where therapeutic radiation procedures are performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: External Beam Radiation Therapy Facility Patient Questionnaire
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to the predetermined set of questions used to collect data about an individual who will receive care at an institution where procedures for therapeutic application of radiation are performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (ray-dee-AY-shun) Radiation therapy that uses a machine to aim high-energy rays at the cancer.

Concepts.definition: Radiation therapy in which high-energy beams are delivered to the tumor from outside of the body.

Property.preferredDefinition: Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.:A person who requires medical care.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
